document_data.name: ''Flaming Orb''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flaming orbs''''', were [[wizard]]ly [[crystal]] orb implements that hid raging inferno inside them, popularized in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Flaming orbs'' served the purpose of enhancing a wizard's fire-related magics, making the flames created hotted and damage more severe.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''flaming orbs'' could be found among spellcasters of the [[Sword Mountains]], areas surrounding the city and markets of [[Neverwinter]].
